parsed.title: O mito do menino mártir: da imprensa à internet
parsed.summary: Um assassinato infantil manipulado no século XV foi transformado em símbolo de santidade para enriquecer um bispo e reforçar o ódio contra os judeus. Centenas de anos depois, a mesma imagem ressurgiu nas redes, alimentando um atentado moderno contra uma sinagoga. O verdadeiro vilão não é a violência, mas o sistema que fabrica e perpetua a mentira.

scenes.narration: Uma criança morta, uma confissão forjada. Quem realmente escreveu a história sombria desse mito?
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, blurred portrait of a toddler beside a forged confession parchment, candle flame flickering, shadows engulfing the room, low-key illumination
scenes.motionDescription: Slow dolly forward toward the child portrait, candle flames gently flickering, dust particles drifting in the light beam
scenes.audioDescription: Distant church bells with reverb, low humming drone

scenes.narration: O bispo comandou a imprensa, imprimindo imagens da criança como mártir para ganhar poder.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, bishop's study filled with a wooden printing press, sheets bearing the child's image, the bishop signing a decree, candlelight casting long shadows
scenes.motionDescription: Gentle camera pan right across the press, paper sheets fluttering as they feed through
scenes.audioDescription: Clacking of press gears, rustling parchment, faint crackle of candle

scenes.narration: Séculos depois, um adolescente usou a internet para reviver o mito, atacando uma sinagoga.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, teenage bedroom at night, glowing laptop screen displaying a meme of the child martyr, walls covered in faint posters, blue LED light casting cold tones
scenes.motionDescription: Slow zoom into laptop screen, cursor flickering, subtle breath fog on the glass
scenes.audioDescription: Soft electronic hum, notification ping echoing

scenes.narration: A imagem da criança virou brinquedo, espalhando ódio silencioso em salas de jogos e memes.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, plastic figurine of the child placed on a cluttered gaming shelf, neon LED glow from consoles, shadows stretching across the room
scenes.motionDescription: Static wide shot with subtle dust drifting, soft focus on the figurine
scenes.audioDescription: Low synth ambience from game console, faint electronic buzz

scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, black screen fading into faint white text "The Gap Files." centered, minimal illumination
scenes.motionDescription: Slow fade to black, text appearing with subtle light bloom

backgroundMusic.prompt: Dark Ambient, Low Drone Synths, Sparse Piano Notes, Tension Strings, Eerie Pads, Subtle Heartbeat Rhythm, Minor Key, well-arranged composition, 70 BPM
